experience.title: Data Intern
experience.summary: Managed extensive SQL databases and large datasets to ensure efficient storage, retrieval, and analysis.

projects.name: MenuIQ - Restaurant Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive, full-stack restaurant management system designed to streamline operations and improve efficiency for restaurants. Features multi-role user management, real-time order processing, advanced analytics, and multi-language support.
highlights: Multi-role operations: Owner/Manager Dashboard, Cashier Interface, Kitchen Interface with role-based access control
Advanced analytics: Revenue tracking, menu profitability analysis, customer feedback analytics with Nivo charts
Comprehensive menu management: Multi-language support (English/Arabic), bulk import/export, image management
Real-time features: Live order status updates, kitchen-cashier coordination, mobile-responsive design
Technical stack: React 19 with modern hooks, Material-UI components, Vite for fast builds
Backend architecture: Node.js/Express with MySQL, JWT auth, file uploads, rate limiting
Security: Helmet headers, bcrypt hashing, input validation, SQL injection prevention
Database design: Connection pooling, transactions, soft delete, activity logging
User experience: Framer Motion animations, responsive design, internationalization
Business features: QR code generation, email notifications, audit trails, API-first design
Scalability: Multi-business support, enterprise features, third-party integrations ready

projects.name: ASU-GU Portal - University Course Equivalency Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive course equivalency management system between Galala University and Arizona State University, featuring multi-role authentication, batch uploads, advanced search/filtering, and audit trails.
highlights: Multi-role auth: Admin, Program Director, Cintana Users with OTP recovery
Course equivalency: manual entry, Excel/CSV batch uploads, CRUD operations
Advanced search/filtering by level, delivery mode, transfer direction
Comprehensive data: course codes, catalog years, prerequisites, program associations
Security: password strength validation, forced resets, SQL injection prevention, XSS protection
File processing: Excel/CSV parsing with xlsx library, upload validation
Database: normalized schema, indexing, audit logging, pagination for large datasets
Email integration: OTP delivery, notifications via Nodemailer
UI: Tailwind CSS responsive design, Material Design icons, mobile-first
Architecture: ES6 modules, RESTful API, rate limiting, session security
Business impact: streamlined student transfers, automated workflows, audit compliance

projects.name: AI-Powered Real Estate CRM System
projects.description: Comprehensive multi-role CRM for real estate with AI-driven insights, real-time analytics, multi-channel lead management, ad platform integrations, property catalog, and BI dashboards.
highlights: Role-based access (Admin, Sales Manager, Sales Rep, Marketing Analyst)
Secure auth with bcrypt and protected routes
Real-time KPI dashboards and conversion tracking
Campaign ROI and performance metrics with export (PDF, CSV, Excel)
AI marketing insights via OpenRouter; automated lead scoring and distribution
Lead tracking across WhatsApp, email, web forms, ads with activity logging
Google/Meta/LinkedIn/TikTok integrations with UTM attribution
Property inventory with media galleries and payment plans
Puppeteer/jsPDF reports, Nodemailer automation
MySQL with 20+ normalized tables, indexing, and audit logging

projects.name: Health Ethics Learning Platform (LMS)
projects.description: Role-based Health Ethics LMS with secure auth (OTP, resets), course/quiz management, announcements, messaging with spam detection, and student analytics (grades/transcript/GPA).
highlights: RBAC: Admin, Instructor, Student with middleware-guarded routes
Auth: session/JWT, OTP verification, password reset and forced updates
Course/Module/Page management with enhanced assignments
Quizzes with submissions, feedback, resubmission, grade approvals/analysis
Announcements to targeted recipients; inbox/sent messaging with spam detection
Student dashboards: grades, transcript, attendance, GPA calculator
Admin console: users, enrollments, announcements, message audit, resets
MySQL pooling, migrations, helpers; file uploads for profile images

projects.name: Hospital Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive, multi-role hospital management platform that streamlines operations across appointments, billing, pharmacy, medical records, and user management with secure authentication and automated PDF invoicing.
highlights: Multi-role system: Patient, Doctor, Receptionist, Pharmacist
Appointment booking with time-slot validation and doctor availability
Room allocation, rescheduling, cancellation, and billing integration
Automated invoice generation using PDFKit with branding
Insurance verification, payment status tracking, multi-payment methods
Pharmacy: prescriptions, inventory with expiry tracking, refills, automated billing
Medical records: histories, lab tests, radiology reports, allergies/meds
Security: sessions, bcrypt hashing, RBAC, secure uploads and profile photos
File management: insurance docs, PDF storage/retrieval
Architecture: MVC, transactions for integrity, comprehensive error handling
Responsive UI with role-specific navigation and dynamic filters/search
Team delivery: sprint workflow, feature branches, documented codebase

projects.name: Blind Walking Stick
projects.description: Assists visually impaired individuals using ultrasonic sensors, gyroscope, and water sensor.

projects.name: E-Commerce Bookstore Platform with AI Integration
projects.description: Full-stack online bookstore with AI-powered recommendations, smart search, intelligent chatbot, secure auth, shopping cart, and order management.
highlights: Secure auth: bcrypt hashing, session-based login, role-based access (Admin/User)
E-commerce: product catalog, categories, cart with quantity/stock validation, orders, inventory tracking
AI features: NLP smart search, personalized recommendations, review sentiment analysis, chatbot support
Modern UI/UX: responsive design, glassmorphism, animated backgrounds, floating labels, mobile-first
Architecture: MVC with modular models/controllers/views and clean RESTful endpoints
Database: MySQL schema with users, books, cart, orders, reviews; pooling and optimized queries
Security: input validation, SQL injection prevention, secure session management
Real-time cart updates and stock synchronization

projects.name: Smart Parking System
